Title: Wherever You Are Is My Home
Writer: Lucy Maud Montgomery (novel), Antonio Ranieri (script coordinator), Moira Walley-Beckett
Actors: Amybeth McNulty, Geraldine James, R.H. Thomson, Dalila Bela
Plot: The Cuthberts vow to do whatever it takes to save the farm, which reminds Anne of the strength of friendship and love.
